Add baseline creatinine clearance field.

Source: R/nif_class.R
add_bl_crcl.Rd

Add baseline creatinine clearance field.

Usage

add_bl_crcl(obj, method = egfr_cg)

Arguments

obj

A NIF object.

method

The function to calculate eGFR (CrCL) from serum creatinine. Currently either: egfr_mdrd, egfr_cg or egfr_raynaud

Value

A NIF object.

See also

egfr_mdrd()

egfr_cg()

egfr_raynaud()

Examples

head(add_bl_crcl(examplinib_poc_nif))
#>   REF ID    STUDYID           USUBJID AGE SEX  RACE HEIGHT WEIGHT      BMI
